name: Arlan

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

story: The head of Herta Space Station's Security Department.This quiet boy hopes to protect the researchers who value their pursuit of knowledge, and to help them to complete their work.

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow
Lightning Crown of the Past Shadow

skills.name: Lightning Rush
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Shackle Breaker
skills.description: Consumes a portion of HP to deal Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Frenzied Punishment
skills.description: Deals massive Lightning DMG to a single enemy and Lightning DMG to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Pain and Anger
skills.description: Gain DMG bonus based on percent of HP lost.

skills.name: Swift Harvest
skills.description: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals minor Lightning DMG to all enemies.

eidolons.name: To the Bitter End
eidolons.description: When HP is lower than or equal to 50% of Max HP, increases Skill's DMG by 10%.

eidolons.name: Breaking Free
eidolons.description: Using Skill or Ultimate removes 1 debuff from oneself.

eidolons.name: Power Through
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Turn the Tables
eidolons.description: When struck by a killing blow after entering battle, instead of becoming knocked down, Arlan immediately restores his HP to 25% of his Max HP. This effect is automatically removed after it is triggered once or after 2 turn(s) have elapsed.

eidolons.name: Hammer and Tongs
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Self-Sacrifice
eidolons.description: When HP drops to 50% or below, Ultimate deals 20% more DMG. The DMG multiplier of DMG taken by the target enemy now applies to adjacent enemies as well.
